feed.title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 02 2024 - Tue Jul 09 2024
entry.summary: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
entry.content:
BCD Changes Report, Tue Jul 09 2024

Summary of BCD changes from Tuesday, 2 July 2024 to Tuesday, 9 July 2024

Browser Support Changes: +5, -0

Support increases (5)

css

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-block
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-inline
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ flip-start
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ inset-area
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ position-try-fallbacks ➞ none
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 91

Show all 91 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occuring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (36)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Tuesday, 2 July 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

api

  1. api ➞ BarcodeDetector ➞ BarcodeDetector
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ BarcodeDetector
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ BarcodeDetector ➞ detect
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ BarcodeDetector ➞ getSupportedFormats_static

    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ CSSScopeRule ➞ start
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

  9. api ➞ HTMLBaseElement ➞ href ➞ forbid_special_characters
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ IntersectionObserver ➞ delay

  12. api ➞ IntersectionObserverEntry ➞ isVisible

    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  14. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-paint
    Backfilled from  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  15. api ➞ VTTCue ➞ text ➞ all_html_character_references
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

css

    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ at-rules ➞ scope
    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Backfilled from  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (18)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Tuesday, 2 July 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

api

  1. api ➞ HTMLBaseElement ➞ href ➞ forbid_special_characters
  2. api ➞ IntersectionObserver ➞ delay
  3. api ➞ IntersectionObserver ➞ trackVisibility
  4. api ➞ IntersectionObserverEntry ➞ isVisible
  5. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-contentful-paint
  6. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-paint
  7. api ➞ VTTCue ➞ text ➞ all_html_character_references

  5. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ executeScript ➞ world ➞ MAIN

Removed entries (37)

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Tuesday, 2 July 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.
